title: Create code-generation patterns (3)
description: Create three code generation patterns: python-function.pattern.md, python-class.pattern.md, and test-file.pattern.md. Each includes proper docstrings, type hints, error handling templates, and testing best practices.
notes: Created 3 code-generation patterns: python-function.pattern.md (functions with docstrings/type hints), python-class.pattern.md (classes with __init__/__str__/__repr__), test-file.pattern.md (pytest/unittest with fixtures/mocks).
